name: custom-plugin-sql
title: SQL & Database Mastery
description: Comprehensive SQL and database learning system with 7 specialized agents covering SQL fundamentals, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Data Analysis, Data Engineering, and BI - designed for complete database mastery
author: Claude Code Plugin Development

agents.name: SQL Fundamentals Expert
agents.description: Master SQL basics, DDL, DML, joins, subqueries, and optimization

agents.name: PostgreSQL DBA Specialist
agents.description: Learn PostgreSQL administration, configuration, replication, and high availability

agents.name: MongoDB & NoSQL Expert
agents.description: Master MongoDB, document models, aggregation, and NoSQL design patterns

agents.name: Redis & Caching Specialist
agents.description: Learn Redis data structures, caching strategies, and real-time applications

agents.name: Data Analyst Guide
agents.description: SQL for analytics, data exploration, reporting, and business intelligence fundamentals

agents.name: Data Engineer Roadmap
agents.description: Database design for big data, data warehousing, ETL, and scaling systems

agents.name: Business Intelligence Analyst
agents.description: SQL for BI, data modeling, metrics, dashboards, and business analytics

skills.name: SQL Fundamentals
skills.description: SQL syntax, DDL, DML, and query basics

skills.name: Advanced SQL
skills.description: Joins, subqueries, CTEs, window functions, and optimization

skills.name: PostgreSQL Administration
skills.description: PostgreSQL setup, configuration, backup, and replication

skills.name: PostgreSQL Security
skills.description: Authentication, roles, privileges, and security best practices

skills.name: MongoDB Mastery
skills.description: Document models, CRUD, aggregation, and indexing

skills.name: NoSQL Design Patterns
skills.description: Denormalization, embedding, references, and schema design

skills.name: Redis Data Structures
skills.description: Strings, lists, hashes, sets, sorted sets, and advanced features

skills.name: Redis Patterns & Use Cases
skills.description: Caching, sessions, rate limiting, real-time applications

skills.name: SQL for Data Analysis
skills.description: Exploratory analysis, aggregations, and statistical queries

skills.name: BI Fundamentals
skills.description: Metrics, dimensions, fact tables, and reporting architecture

skills.name: Data Warehouse Design
skills.description: Star schema, dimensional modeling, and warehouse architecture

skills.name: ETL & Data Pipelines
skills.description: Extract, transform, load, and data pipeline design patterns
